history.content: I'm going to say that they'll probably stay the same, but you can't be quite sure that a new faculty head of the masters programs won't come in and redo a few things. I think it might be too late to change the application, though. You have to do it really early. Even if they do, the questions probably won't change dramatically, and you can retool what you've written to work for the new questions. I keep offering my help as an English Ph.D. to people one at a time, which isn't really fair, so I'll say here that if you want me to read through your essays, I am happy to do that and give you feedback, as long as you don't all give them to me the night before they're due.

I am interested in applying to the fifth year master's program at UC Berkeley, and visited the following website for the fifth year master's program: https://eecs.berkeley.edu/academics/graduate/industry-programs/5yrms/apply. I was wondering if the essay prompts will remain the same in the upcoming application cycle(has it remained the same throughout all application cycles?), for the statement of purpose and the personal history statement, since I would like to start drafting the essays soon.
history.subject: 5th Year Masters Essay Prompts
